entry.title: Questionmark secure browser crashing
entry.content:
Hello everybody,

it seems the Questionmark secure browser has a few problems. When I try to launch it for an actual exam (the sample assessment works), the Windows session fulfills all criteria, I get the following error in the Windows Application Log:

Faulting application name: Questionmark Secure for Windows Desktop.exe, version: 6.1.59.5, time stamp: 0x674071c0
Faulting module name: KERNELBASE.dll, version: 10.0.26100.4343, time stamp: 0x677e8431
Exception code: 0xe0434352
Fault offset: 0x0015f4c4
Faulting process id: 0x14F4
Faulting application start time: 0x1DBE10F02367EAF
Faulting application path: C:\Program Files (x86)\Questionmark\QS\Questionmark Secure for Windows Desktop.exe
Faulting module path: C:\WINDOWS\System32\KERNELBASE.dll
Report Id: 6522047c-df9b-4afc-a912-34aa1e029e6b
Faulting package full name:
Faulting package-relative application ID:

 

Application: Questionmark Secure for Windows Desktop.exe
Framework Version: v4.0.30319
Description: The process was terminated due to an unhandled exception.
Exception Info: System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException
at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.__Canon, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.__Canon, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]].get_Item(System.__Canon)
at QM.QSB4WindowsDesktop.QmsbApplication.<ProcessBlackListCheck>b__43_2(System.String)
at System.Linq.Enumerable+WhereSelectListIterator`2[[System.__Canon, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.__Canon, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]].MoveNext()
at System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.__Canon, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]..ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<System.__Canon>)
at System.Linq.Enumerable.ToList[[System.__Canon, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]](System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<System.__Canon>)
at QM.QSB4WindowsDesktop.QmsbApplication.ProcessBlackListCheck(Boolean, Boolean)
at QM.QSB4WindowsDesktop.App.OnStartup(System.Windows.StartupEventArgs)
at System.Windows.Application.<.ctor>b__1_0(System.Object)
at System.Windows.Threading.ExceptionWrapper.InternalRealCall(System.Delegate, System.Object, Int32)
at System.Windows.Threading.ExceptionWrapper.TryCatchWhen(System.Object, System.Delegate, System.Object, Int32, System.Delegate)
at System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.InvokeImpl()
at System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.InvokeInSecurityContext(System.Object)
at MS.Internal.CulturePreservingExecutionContext.CallbackWrapper(System.Object)
at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.RunInternal(System.Threading.ExecutionContext, System.Threading.ContextCallback, System.Object, Boolean)
at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run(System.Threading.ExecutionContext, System.Threading.ContextCallback, System.Object, Boolean)
at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run(System.Threading.ExecutionContext, System.Threading.ContextCallback, System.Object)
at MS.Internal.CulturePreservingExecutionContext.Run(MS.Internal.CulturePreservingExecutionContext, System.Threading.ContextCallback, System.Object)
at System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Invoke()
at System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ProcessQueue()
at System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.WndProcHook(IntPtr, Int32, IntPtr, IntPtr, Boolean ByRef)
at MS.Win32.HwndWrapper.WndProc(IntPtr, Int32, IntPtr, IntPtr, Boolean ByRef)
at MS.Win32.HwndSubclass.DispatcherCallbackOperation(System.Object)
at System.Windows.Threading.ExceptionWrapper.InternalRealCall(System.Delegate, System.Object, Int32)
at System.Windows.Threading.ExceptionWrapper.TryCatchWhen(System.Object, System.Delegate, System.Object, Int32, System.Delegate)
at System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.LegacyInvokeImpl(System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority, System.TimeSpan, System.Delegate, System.Object, Int32)
at MS.Win32.HwndSubclass.SubclassWndProc(IntPtr, Int32, IntPtr, IntPtr)
at MS.Win32.UnsafeNativeMethods.DispatchMessage(System.Windows.Interop.MSG ByRef)
at System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.PushFrameImpl(System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame)
at System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.PushFrame(System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame)
at System.Windows.Application.RunDispatcher(System.Object)
at System.Windows.Application.RunInternal(System.Windows.Window)
at System.Windows.Application.Run(System.Windows.Window)
at QM.QSB4WindowsDesktop.App.Main()

I have tried it with local admin accounts, non-admin accounts, and even accounts which are not subjected to security policies, to no avail. I'm running Windows 11 on a current patch level.

Of course, SAP and or examity.com do not allow iPads for SAP exams.

Is there a way SAP or Examity could open a proper support ticket at the publisher Learnosity, and/or supply a test tool with which we can test whether a session on Windows fulfills the requirements?

Regards,

Ren√©

entry.title: Help Booking SAP S/4HANA Asset Management Certification as a Student
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I‚Äôm a student currently trying to book the SAP S/4HANA Asset Management certification exam. I‚Äôve already created my SAP Learning account and received my P-user ID.

When I click ‚ÄúBook Exam,‚Äù I‚Äôm prompted to get a subscription. Out of the three options, I selected the free student subscription, completed the onboarding form, received the confirmation email, and successfully enrolled in a course as a student.

However, I‚Äôm still unable to schedule a certification exam‚Äîthe booking option remains unavailable, and I don‚Äôt see a way to proceed from the student dashboard.

I have already raised a technical support case regarding this issue, but it‚Äôs been five days with no resolution.

Any guidance or help from the community or SAP support team would be much appreciated!

Thank you in advance.

entry.title: C_S4CFI_2504 Schedule Exam is grayed out even though I have completed the course outline
entry.content:
This is about a recent issue I encountered on SAP Learning Hub related to the C_S4CFI_2504 certification exam.

Previously, the exam could be scheduled without any prerequisites. However, within the past month, a new requirement was introduced mandating the completion of a practical test before scheduling the exam. While I understand and support the importance of ensuring expertise, the sudden implementation of this requirement came without prior notification.

Despite this, I completed the necessary practical test. However, the system seems to have reset my progress, and the ‚ÄúSchedule Exam‚Äù button is now greyed out. When I attempt to retake the practical test, I receive a message stating that the content has been updated and the page needs to be refreshed. Unfortunately, refreshing the page does not resolve the issue, and the test does not complete‚Äîeven though I had successfully completed it before.

Has someone experienced the same? If yes, what did you do? 
SAP Learning Hub  SAP S/4HANA Finance Certification

entry.title: Is the "SAP Certified Associate - SAP Generative AI Developer" certification a solid entry point?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I saw that SAP recently released the SAP Certified Associate - SAP Generative AI Developer certification. I‚Äôm currently exploring how to get started with AI from a technical perspective, and this certification caught my attention. I‚Äôm curious to know if it could be a practical and valuable entry point.

Here‚Äôs what I‚Äôm looking for:

  • Feedback from anyone who has taken or started preparing for this certification.
  • Whether the developer tools, frameworks, and APIs related to SAP‚Äôs Generative AI are production-ready or still evolving.
  • Your thoughts on whether this certification will hold value from a technical and practical perspective over the next few years.

I‚Äôm absolutely fine if the offering is still maturing, I just want to avoid diving in too early if it‚Äôs not yet relevant for developers.

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts and experiences!

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: SAP certificate not received after passing the certification
entry.content:
I have recently given my SAP exam on SAP Certified Associate - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition, Management Accounting Exam on 10.08.2025 with SAP certification ID: C_TS4CO_2023. But I have not received any mail of digital badge download.

I have already passed the exam with 78% but I am yet to receive the certificate. I have also raised a ticket 5000199873 but there is no response yet from the support team.

I am little bit worried now because this is the 2nd certificate which I have given exam now, for the first certificate I have received it within few minutes after completing.

Can anyone from SAP community please help me what should I do know. Any contacts will help me as well.

Thanks & Regards,
Koustav

entry.title: Is SAP Certified Associate - SAP HCM for SAP ECC or SAP S/4HANA (C_P2W12_2311) retired or not?
entry.content:
When checking out the available certifications on the website, you can not longer find it.

Nonetheless, in the exam dashboard you can still schedule an exam for C_P2W12_2311?

entry.title: Looking for Updated SAP C_THR88_2505 Practice Questions 2025?
entry.content:
I‚Äôm preparing for the SAP C THR88 2505 exam and want to make sure I‚Äôm studying with the most updated and reliable practice resources for 2025.

If you‚Äôve used any trusted platforms that provide realistic mock exams reflecting the actual test difficulty and structure, please share your suggestions. I‚Äôd love to focus on high quality material that truly makes a difference in passing.

Thanks a lot for your help!

entry.title: Credit card Option is also Not available
entry.content:
Dear SAP Training Support Team,

I hope you are doing well.

I am trying to purchase an SAP Certification attempt through the SAP Certification Hub. In my account, I can only see Invoice and Preferred Card as options, but no active debit or credit card payment method is available.

Could you kindly advise which payment methods are supported for my country(India) and guide me on the best way to proceed with the payment?

I would greatly appreciate your assistance.

Warm regards,

Mohamad Inayath

entry.title: OpenText training and certification for SAP resellers
entry.content:
Boost Your Services. Build Customer Trust. Get Certified.

Over half of SAP license and cloud sales involve a trusted partner. With sales growth of more than 27% projected in the coming year, there‚Äôs never been a better time to strengthen your offering for 2025/2026.

SAP and OpenText are excited to launch the updated training and certification program for SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core by OpenText (also known as OpenText Core Content Management for SAP SuccessFactors ).

Why this matters for you and your customers
If your customers use SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central but lack a fully integrated HR document management solution, you have a perfect opportunity to deliver sustainable, transformational change. With the SaaS solution SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core, you can help your customers:

  • Streamline onboarding and HR processes with automation and workflows.

Provide secure, role-based access to employee files from within SAP SuccessFactors HCM

  • Meet data privacy requirements while ensuring complete employee files with records management
  • Improve HR communications with accurate and personalized employee documents

As SAP‚Äôs largest Solution Extension partner, OpenText offers a product that is SAP-tested, validated, and approved‚Äîgiving your customers confidence in your services. Trained partners can deliver an integrated HR document management platform within weeks, providing your customers with a more compliant solution across the entire hire-to-retire cycle.

Why certification is essential
SAP will only provide full support for configurations implemented by certified partners. Without the badge, you risk delays and limitations in being able to provide the support your customers expect.

When you complete the course and pass the exam, you‚Äôll be equipped to deliver exceptional customer experiences when implementing SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core. Certification will showcase to customers you‚Äôre ready.

You can also grow your revenue with expanded services such as advanced document workflows, intelligent capture, AI and API integrations. Explore Standard or Premium individual learning subscriptions.

Get certified today

 Partner certification exam.

  • This is a scheduled 2-hour exam
  • Number for questions:  60
  • Questions format: The test includes question formats such as multiple choice and true/false.
  • Passing Score:  70%
  • Language: English
  • Investment: $500 USD (or your country's currency equivalent, excluding VAT or other taxes)
  • See also Additional Details, including certification validity & renewal and retakes policy information.

Prepare for the certification exam with solution training

If you want to enhance your customer service abilities and get closer to a 100% pass rate, we highly recommend that you enrol in a small group training program.

What you can expect

  • Two days of instructor-led training for SAP resellers (OpenText reseller status is not necessary). 
  • Available in English and German.
  • Investment: $2,400.00 USD (or local currency equivalent, excluding VAT and taxes).

What you‚Äôll gain from the training

  • Live, interactive sessions led by expert trainers
  • Guidance on configuration, integration, and personalization.
  • Tools to deliver targeted, automated communications.
  • Preparation for the certification exam.
  • Promotion of your services through SAP and OpenText reseller channels.

Discover additional learning subscription options to continue your growth journey.

Ready to take the next step?
Register now for the upcoming virtual training session for SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core by OpenText. For more details, contact training@opentext.com.

Let‚Äôs work together to make every SAP SuccessFactors HCM project a success.

SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core by Open Text , HCM Employee Self-Service , Partnership ,

entry.title: C_TS4FI_2023 Practice Questions
entry.content:
I recently passed the C_TS4FI_2023 (SAP S/4HANA Finance) exam üéâ and I‚Äôd highly recommend a mix of official SAP study materials along with trusted practice resources.

The official SAP Learning Hub and SAP training guides are great for building a solid foundation, but what really helped me was Passexamhub. Their updated and exam-style practice questions matched the real test format closely and gave me the confidence I needed to clear the exam on my first attempt.

If you‚Äôre preparing, I‚Äôd suggest using both the official SAP resources for concepts and Passexamhub practice questions for realistic exam prep it‚Äôs the perfect combination.

entry.title: Certifications not visible on " my certifications " on learning.sap
entry.content:
My valid certifications are not visible under " my certifications" on learning.sap. I checked some similar existing queries and also raised a query with support. They have verified that my universal id is correctly set up and also the email attached to my profile is correct and they are able to see that I have certifications. 

But they also said that "my certifications" tab is experiencing some technical issue so it is not visible on my end. And then they closed the ticket. Can someone please let me know if they are also facing similar issues. It has been quite a few days I am not able to see the certifications and also I don't understand, if I cant access it how can I renew it?

Appreciate any feedback and response

Thanks

entry.title: C_WZADM_2404 Exam (SAP Build Work Zone) - Guidance for Preparing SAP Certified Associate
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I‚Äôm planning to take the SAP Certified Associate ‚Äì SAP Build Work Zone Implementation and Administration (C_WZADM_2404) exam. I‚Äôve reviewed the Learning Journey and the exam topics like Solution Architecture, Extensibility, Integration, and Overview, but I‚Äôm still unsure how to structure my preparation effectively.

For those who have already taken this certification:

Which areas did you find the most challenging?

Are the official Learning Journey and practice materials enough, or should I look into additional resources?

Any tips on managing time during the 60 questions / 2-hour exam?

Appreciate any insights or personal experiences you can share.

Thanks in advance!
